name: Garmin HRM Dual
description: With a soft, comfortable strap the Garmin HRM-Dual will be the last thing on your mind as you head for the finish line, survive your next spin class, or hop on your trainer. Broadcasting over both ANT+® and Bluetooth® you get a strong signal that can talk to almost anything, from your phone, to you bike GPS, to the equipment at the gym.Broadcasts your heart rate over both ANT+ and Bluetooth.Soft strap is comfortable and works well with snug clothing like sports bras and jerseys.Snap off sensor makes the strap easy to wash.Single CR2032 battery lasts for up to 3.5 years and is easy to change when the time comes.Adjusts to fit chests from 63.5cm to 132cm (25in. to 52in).Water resistant to 1m.
